name: BlockTrix
description:
Breaking Blocks is an addictive and fun game that you can enjoy any time when you are bored.

Your mision is to eliminate blocks of same color or shape that are grouped by 2 or more. To pass level there must be less tan 10 blocks on the screen. Look well the strategy to follow in order to achieve the following levels and so complete new worlds.

Use special blocks to help you destroy all blocks.

In total there are up to 120 levels and 6 worlds which bring you new scenarios and where you will have to achieve a goal, by getting the highest number of possible stars.

It is optimized for best display of new iPad and iPhone´s retina screen with excellent high-resolution graphics and full screen interface.

Blocks is available in several languages including: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian and Portuguese. It also has a sophisticated and intuitive interface.

Features:

- No time limit

- Playable on all devices

- Enabled Game-Center with worlwide leaderboards and 6 achievements to unlock

- Background music and sound effects

- Auto-save when application is closed or when you answer a telephone call while you are playing, in order to continue playing it from where you were, after finishing the call

We hope you enjoy it and remember, blocks is an easy game to play but difficult to master.
